channel.title: "Why do we all have to wear these ridiculous ties?"
channel.description:
MAP: bm_c1a0a GETPOS: setpos 330.198975 616.901245 576.031250;setang 4.650060 19.942438 0.000000
Scientists' ties violently spaz out every frame Tried to screenshot but right before I do, the problem corrects itself. (I shit you not) Might occour in more maps, but reported as soon as I saw it

item.title: "Why do we all have to wear these ridiculous ties?"

item.description:
Working as designed? Actually, yes we are now aware of this.
